org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.caches

Class ProjectionsCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.caches.ProjectionsCache

  • public class ProjectionsCache
extends Object
    Cache used for storing data of region projections on features.

      • projectionsOfRegions

        public static Map<Integer,RegionProjection> projectionsOfRegions(int featureIdx,
                                                                 int maxDepth,
                                                                 IntStream regionIndexes,
                                                                 int blockSize,
                                                                 IgniteFunction<Integer,Object> affinity,
                                                                 UUID trainingUUID,
                                                                 Ignite ignite)
        Get region projections in the form of map (regionIndex -> regionProjections).
        Parameters:
        featureIdx - Feature index.
        maxDepth - Max depth of decision tree.
        regionIndexes - Indexes of regions for which we want get projections.
        blockSize - Size of regions block.
        affinity - Affinity function.
        trainingUUID - UUID of training.
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        Returns:
        Region projections in the form of map (regionIndex -> regionProjections).

      • projectionsOfFeature

        public static Map<Integer,RegionProjection> projectionsOfFeature(int featureIdx,
                                                                 int maxDepth,
                                                                 int regsCnt,
                                                                 int blockSize,
                                                                 IgniteFunction<Integer,Object> affinity,
                                                                 UUID trainingUUID,
                                                                 Ignite ignite)
        Returns projections of regions on given feature filtered by maximal depth in the form of (region index -> region projection).
        Parameters:
        featureIdx - Feature index.
        maxDepth - Maximal depth of the tree.
        regsCnt - Count of regions.
        blockSize - Size of regions blocks.
        affinity - Affinity function.
        trainingUUID - UUID of training.
        ignite - Ignite instance.
        Returns:
        Projections of regions on given feature filtered by maximal depth in the form of (region index -> region projection).

      • key

        public static ProjectionsCache.RegionKey key(int featureIdx,
                                             int regBlockIdx,
                                             Object parentColKey,
                                             UUID uuid)
        Construct key for projections cache.
        Parameters:
        featureIdx - Feature index.
        regBlockIdx - Region block index.
        parentColKey - Column key of cache used as input for ColumnDecisionTreeTrainer.
        uuid - UUID of training.
        Returns:
        Key for projections cache.

                         int regs,
                         IgniteBiFunction<Integer,Ignite,Object> aff,
                         UUID uuid,

        Clear data from projections cache related to given training.
        Parameters:
        featuresCnt - Features count.
        regs - Regions count.
